thread.title: Microsoft Windows 10 Devices Launch Live Updates: Surface Book is Microsoft’s first laptop, and it’s smokin’ hot

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Windows 10 Devices Launch Live Updates: Surface Book is Microsoft’s first laptop, and it’s smokin’ hot
text: Along with the new Lumia smartphones, Microsoft Band 2 and the Surface Book 4, Microsoft surprised everyone with its first ever laptop, called the Surface Book. Touted as the ultimate laptop, which is also, wait for it, a tablet, Microsoft claims the Surface Book is two times faster than the Apple’s MacBook Pro. It comes with a 13.5-inch PixelSense touchscreen display with a pixel density of 267 PPI (6 million pixels). Just like the Surface Pro 4, the Surface Book is covered with a layer of Corning Gorilla Glass 4 to keep scratches at bay. Under the hood, you have Intel’s sixth-generation Core i7 processor along with Nvidia GeForce GPU with GDDR5 memory. The Surface Book is elegant laptop with a »
